title: 30X60 Rectangle Aluminum Mirror with Framed LED with Features
features: High quality - Aluminum surface with acrylic diffuser layer which provides an even Undisturbed lighting, unlike others will spread an uneven light. - Rust-free, chip-free finishes.

Touch Sensor – ‘One single’ operating touch sensor will keep your mirror clean; competitors will have a couple sensor buttons to operate which issue a messy look. With touching it once your light will turn on jointly with the demisting (anti-fog) feature, with holding your finger on it for seconds, the Kelvin light colors will change to warm or cool options – (Anti-fog excludes the 18” round size).
Installation – Easy and quick installation, no professionals required; 4 back holes, option for vertically or horizontally install– All hardware included + hard wired for cleaner and hidden look!
Certification – UL listed for all sizes and styles.
Where to install – Great for bathrooms (over the vanity cabinet,) powder rooms, living rooms or guest rooms. These LED aluminum mirrors will enhance and furnish a luxurious look to any room!
description: This mirror brings more light into your morning routine. It features a sleek frameless design, a circular design, an LED strip that lines the edges of the mirror, and an anti-fog pad to clear your mirror in steamy environments. The LED light has a dimmable setting allowing you to choose the intensity of each light setting. The mirror comes complete with a plug, so you can hang this mirror anywhere you have an outlet close! This mirror is perfect to place above your existing bathroom vanity or entryway table.
